name: Dangerous Warnings
description:
You're designing your very own danger signs, fridge magnet style, to attract or detract people from your beach.

As you can see, the tea cup sized Hitlers are convincing people to leave. But they're not in a rush to leave. They maybe Hitlers but they're just tea cup sized after all.

SEXY HITLERS on the other hand, make people very uncomfortable.

That's why you see them leaving in droves once I add that adjective.


But what if we switched the Hitlers with Sexy Construction Workers?BAM! Now Everyone wants to be on your island!

.

.

When you're happy with your danger sign, all you have to do is click submit to see what happens! :D

There are all these neat little stories depending on the combinations you chose.

I got some fun reactions out of it

Looking at the weird faces people make when they see my games is part of why I do this in the first place.

.

.

.

OH WAIT!

.

.
OH

MY GODI almost forgot the most important part!

THERE IS A HAM MODE

All you have to do is press K and...

Every word turns into ham. All you have to do is press K again to switch it off.

JUST KIDDING YOU JUST GET MORE HAMAND MORE HAM
